body: On February 28, 2011 at 1.00 pm, Kenyans will sing all three verses of the National Anthem. The event is organised online using Twitter and Facebook.
original_body: On February 28, 2011 at 1.00 pm, Kenyans will sing all three verses of the National Anthem. The event is organised online using Twitter and Facebook.
title: Kenya: One Nation, One People, One Anthem

sentence: On February 28, 2011 at 1.00 pm, Kenyans will sing all three verses of the National Anthem.
The event is organised online using Twitter and Facebook.
